description: A collection of circles in a roughly rectangular formation tilted slightly with a teardrop-shaped formation extending downwards from the right side. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a grayish-blue triangle at the bottom of the rectangular formation and a brown triangle at the top of the teardrop-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
